thread.section_title: Apex City of London Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great hotel and location
thread.title_full: Great hotel and location - Review of Apex City of London Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Viktorija J
title: Great hotel and location
text:
It is in an excellent location, 2 mins from Tower Hill station, 5mins to Tower of London. it is a business district so it is relatively quiet area, which suited us fine.
very quick check in, we got the room we asked for.
large bathroom with both bathtub and walk in shower. toiletries and hairdryer provided.
complimentary water, teas and biscuits in the room.
breakfast we thought was too expensive (21GBP for a buffet breakfast), but there were cafes around for cheaper breakfast (all bar one, wheterspoons, starbucks etc.)
we had dinner from the restaurant one of the evenings and it was of good quality.
we also received a complimentary late check out.
